metadata.dc:author: Navarro-Izquierdo, R
Bueno, V
metadata.dc:description: In this work we analyse the information about one group of young patients with cerebrovascular disease, studying the association between haematological pathology and cerebrovascular disease. The objective is to establish a comparison between our results and those previously reported in the medical literature.
metadata.dc:title: Enfermedad vascular cerebral en el adulto joven y alteraciones hematol√≥gicas.
[Stroke and hematological disorders in young people].
